page.title: 09MOTHERS' EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
MY MUM'S JOB from a survey completed by children in our school. By Claire Binney and Sarah Pooley.
Out of 55 mothers,33 have no outside job but are housewives. The remaining 22 mothers have part- time jobs. Some work for part of the week. Others have summer jobs connected with the tourist trade. 5 are home-help,3 work in shops,2 work on farms,2 bake pasties for the baker's shop, 2 have cleaning jobs, 2 are waitresses. There is one teacher and one dinner lady. One works in a factory, one makes pottery, one helps to run a restaurant, one works in a pub.
